scents.name: Apple Harvest
scents.blurb: Crisp orchard air and sun-warmed apple skins—finished with a whisper of spice that feels like fall coming home.

scents.name: Black Raspberry Vanilla
scents.blurb: Dark berries and velvet sweetness—rich, smooth, and addictive, like dessert served by candlelight.

scents.name: Cranberry Woods
scents.blurb: Bright cranberry lifted by warm woods and soft resin—clean, confident, and quietly unforgettable.

scents.name: Fierce AF
scents.blurb: Bold, clean, and unapologetic—an elevated edge that fills the room like confidence with the lights down.

scents.name: French Lilac
scents.blurb: A fresh-cut bouquet at golden hour—soft petals, airy sweetness, and a romantic finish that lingers.

scents.name: Japanese Cherry Blossom
scents.blurb: Delicate florals with a silky, serene glow—springtime elegance that makes any room feel refined.

scents.name: Lavender
scents.blurb: Pure lavender, calm and smooth—like clean sheets, quiet evenings, and the exhale you’ve been waiting for.

scents.name: Peppermint Eucalyptus
scents.blurb: Cool mint and clean eucalyptus—bright, breathable, and spa-fresh, like opening the windows after rain.

scents.name: Sandalwood Element
scents.blurb: Creamy woods and soft warmth—grounded, modern, and luxurious, like a perfectly tailored space.

scents.name: White Peach Blossom
scents.blurb: Juicy white peach wrapped in light florals—fresh, soft, and luminous, like sunshine through linen curtains.
